message:
[{{project_id}} - employer-reindex-green] subscription is holding very old messages. Either it is receiving more messages than it can handle, or it is not processing messages properly. This subscription is read by the employer cluster reindexer system, so this means that there is delays in reindexing.

{{#is_alert}}
To resolve, investigate why the subscription is backed up, such as workers are not running properly. If there is a surge of events, it may be fine and we just need to consider scaling up.
{{/is_alert}} @slack-incidents-employers,@slack-incidents-search-technologies

{{#is_recovery}}
[{{project_id}} - employer-reindex-green] subscription holding old messages alert has recovered
{{/is_recovery}} @slack-incidents-employers,@slack-incidents-search-technologies
name: Pubsub: employer-reindex subscription Holding Old Messages
